vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.7;
son of: Ashhur (H0806) and Helah (H2458);
brother of: Haahashtari (H0326), Zereth (H6889), Izhar (H3328) and Koz (H6976);
half-brother of: Ahuzzam (H0275), Hepher (H2660) and Temeni (H8488)
§ Ethnan = "hire of unchastity"
a grandson of Ashur
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1)   don; (2)   hijo de Ashur; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
伊提南 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "hire of unchastity"
猶大的後裔 (代上 4:7)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
伊提南 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "hire of unchastity"
犹大的后裔 (代上 4:7)
